vendor_name: Domaine De Divonne - Hôtel, Golf & Casino
title: Secluded Romance in the French Countryside
description: Nestled magnificently between the Jura Mountains and Mont Blanc-the highest mountain in the Alps-you'll find a spa town perched on the border of French-speaking Switzerland. Enjoy a tranquil and romantic escape surrounded by lush, rolling hills at Domaine De Divonne, a luxe hotel and superb 18-hole golf course which is also part of one of the most famous casinos in France. Experience the serenity of the French mountainside with daily buffet breakfast, welcome glass of champagne on arrival and more.
